description:
Usually, the birth of heirs would be a joy to any kingdom. But at the time of the birth of the royal twins, it was prophesied that if the girl child reaches her 16th birthday, she would be the cause of the destruction of the world. Out of fear of the prophecy, it was decided that she should not be allowed to live and the little child was cast off the highest cliff to a certain death.
http://anidb.net/ch3978 [Pacifica], the child of whom the prophecy spoke, is now 15 years old and travelling with her adoptive brother http://anidb.net/ch3979 [Shannon] and sister http://anidb.net/ch3980 [Raquel] who are dedicated to protect her. Chased by various forces dedicated to see that the sentence of death is carried out, Pacifica is compelled to hide her identity and to rely on the strength of her brother`s sword and the mastery of her sister`s sorcery to stay alive.
With an army of warriors, sorcerers, and the might of the church all dedicated to her death, will the assistance of brother and sister be enough, or will Pacifica have to call forth the power to save herself and fulfil her destiny as it was told in the prophecy?

REGULAR.description:
Pacifica Cassul flees through the countryside with her siblings. Prophesized to destroy the world, she finds persecutors everywhere, even among old friends. But for all their struggle, should such a poison to the world be allowed to live?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le prélude de la princesse-chat exilée

REGULAR.description:
After his failed attempt to help the Cassul siblings, a wannabe-knight named Leo tags along for the journey. He seeks Sir Barrett, a former knight with a dark past. On the way, they encounter a mysterious girl and a dragon determined to guard a lake.
Source: crunchyroll

Fresh out of money, the gang finds work in a small town while they stay at an inn. There, Pacifica befriends the inn-girl, Winia. But the fun is cut short when a familiar foe tries to lure out the Cassuls with a hostage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 赦されざる者の騒動歌

REGULAR.description:
Shannon goes to save Winia, but upon their return, the innkeeper wants the Cassuls to leave. They don’t get very far before a massive creature attacks the town and turns everyone against Pacifica, even her own siblings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le concerto de la rencontre et de la séparation
出会いと別れの協奏曲

REGULAR.description:
The Cassuls confront a musician who controls poisonous bugs. Pacifica is stung, and Leo and Raquel race to find a cure before time runs out. Meanwhile, Chris is asked to reopen an investigation on the Revelation of Saint Grendel from 15 years ago.
Source: crunchyroll

Sir Barrett and Leo come to grips with Pacifica’s true identity, but when a formidable foe kidnaps her siblings, help comes from unexpected allies. When all seems lost, Shannon must prove his worth to an ancient power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Pied Piper Song of the Knights
騎士たる者たちの迷走歌

REGULAR.description:
After their cart takes damage, the siblings find shelter at a nearby town. A peculiar little girl follows Shannon home and is invited to stay, despite Pacifica’s jealousy. Just when things start to look up, Zefiris appears before Pacifica with a warning.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La valse de la fille-chien abandonnée
Waltz of the Abandoned Dog of a Girl

REGULAR.description:
As Zefiris’s warning weighs heavily on Pacifica’s mind, her quarrel with Shannon intensifies. But when Cin goes missing, the siblings discover the girl’s true identity and come face to face with new enemies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le nocturne des liens et des prières

REGULAR.description:
The Cassuls discover a hidden town of heretics who hate the Church of Mauser and follow a woman they call the Scrapped Princess. Things only get stranger when a masked man at her side declares this to be the day they fix the world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 異端者たちに捧ぐ鎮魂歌

REGULAR.description:
Lady Elfitine and her people begin a strange ritual with a sinister plot in mind. But something isn’t right with the spell. Can the Cassul siblings get to the bottom of the magical mayhem before disaster befalls them all?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La sérénade de la princesse factice

REGULAR.description:
The Cassuls arrive at the sea, only to be captured by a group of people living in a futuristic fortress. They seem to know a lot about the Scrapped Princess, and Zefiris soon uncovers the secret behind their technology.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La rhapsodie de la princesse fauve

REGULAR.description:
As a fleet of armed vessels approaches the fortress, Pacifica learns her true purpose from an ancient Dragoon. But when a Peacemaker starts attacking, can the Scrapped Princess harness her own powers in time to save everyone?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Hymn of the Two Princesses

REGULAR.description:
Princess Senes and the Cassuls plan their next move against the Peacemakers. While the siblings catch up on ancient history, the Dragoons halt the fortress’s advance. Is Pacifica’s true power more important than thousands of lives?
Source: crunchyroll

While attempting to restore power to the fortress, Shannon and Pacifica are stopped by the Dragoons, and only Pacifica can save her brother from being brainwashed. Meanwhile, the Royal Forces of Leinwan hear word of Scarlet’s advances.
Source: crunchyroll

The Royal Forces prepare to cast a sinister spell on Scarlet while Peacemakers loom overhead and destroy their fortress’s defense system. When it comes down to a matter of fight or flight, can Shannon rely on Zefiris and face a familiar foe?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`opéra de la puissance et de la stratégie

REGULAR.description:
Unconvinced of her death, friends and enemies in the capital of Leinwan are searching for the Scrapped Princess. But Pacifica has completely lost her memory and has begun a peaceful life with a kind stranger. Is she better off not remembering the truth?
Source: crunchyroll

The search for the Scrapped Princess has intensified, and while Chris’s unit is ordered to join in the search, Cz causes trouble for Shannon. As enemies close in, Pacifica’s friends come to warn her—but they may just be too late.
Source: crunchyroll

Pacifica and her friends are on the run, but they need to steal horses if they want to leave the city. Leo and Furet finally get their hands on the reins when the Royal Forces catch up to them. To make matters worse, Chris’s unit makes their next move.
Source: crunchyroll

Captured by the Royal Forces, Pacifica is thrown into the dungeon where she meets a fellow prisoner. Meanwhile, the General tries to recruit Shannon to assist in his endeavors of conquering Giat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La morne chanson des lamentations d`une mère

REGULAR.description:
Orders have been given to kill the Scrapped Princess, but Shannon won’t stand for it. When Steyr unveils her sinister plan, all of humanity is threatened. Does Shannon have the power to fight the Peacemakers?
Source: crunchyroll

While Shannon and the Gigases wage battle with the Peacemakers, Chris’s unit takes matters into its own hands. The city suffers great damage, and after friends are reunited, one grim question remains for Pacifica.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La chanson passionnée de la divinité solitaire
The Passion of the Lonely God

REGULAR.description:
The Cassuls and their allies make camp and enjoy a short time of peace, when a mysterious woman appears before Pacifica with a cryptic tale. The rest of the world braces for the Scrapped Princess’s birthday, now just three days away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le rondo qui transcende le temps

REGULAR.description:
The day of prophesy is a sunrise away. Pacifica and her friends spend their time in anticipation when Berkens appears with a message. Prince Forsyth wants to meet Pacifica just once before her birthday.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 限りあるものの聖譚曲

REGULAR.description:
The fight reaches its peak as Pacifica’s end draws near. In another dimension, Lord Mauser offers a choice that could change the world forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 守りし者たちの交響曲

WIKIPEDIA_JP: スクラップド・プリンセス

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

3252.name: history is written by the victors

3834.name: impending death -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

4612.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

5890.name: medieval -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

titles.title: สแคร๊ป ปริ๊นเซส
スクラップド・プリンセス [SCRAPPED+PRINCESS]
